Description: Mould-pressed mosaic glass dish with concave sides, a slightly convex base, two wheel-cut lines on the inside and a wheel groove at the carination outside. Made of of the following sections: a) opaque white spirals with opaque yellow centres in clear deep blue ground, b) opaque yellow fillings, c) gilt in colourless ground, d) opaque white in colourless ground.
Bibliographic references: Glass 2 / Catalogue of Greek and Roman Glass, Volume 2 (664)
